Source.Name: gocryptfs
Source.Summary: gocryptfs is an encrypted overlay filesystem written in Go.
Source.Description: gocryptfs uses file-based encryption that is implemented as a mountable FUSE filesystem. Each file in gocryptfs is stored in one corresponding encrypted file on the hard disk.

Package.Name: gocryptfs
Package.Summary: gocryptfs is an encrypted overlay filesystem written in Go.
Package.Description: gocryptfs uses file-based encryption that is implemented as a mountable FUSE filesystem. Each file in gocryptfs is stored in one corresponding encrypted file on the hard disk.
